pullrequest.title: Only link relevant libraries to tests

content.raw:
The [cmake macro documentation](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/command/macro.html) seems to indicate that you should just loop over all the arguments passed to the macro:

~~~
macro(_BAR)
  foreach(arg IN LISTS ARGN)
    [...]
  endforeach()
endmacro()
~~~

I think a macro can only take a single list of arguments; I'm not sure that it knows how to separate them into separate lists.
